body:
So, on my new server, I need a plugin that let's us give tags to people (different colors would be nice). Ex: Jr. Mod, Mod, Sr. Mod, etc.

Anyone know what it is?
body_tagged:

title: What plugin does Avicus use for "Staff Tags"?

replies.body: Funky is a dev. So maybe he made it by himself?
replies.body_tagged: Funky is a dev. So maybe he made it by himself?

replies.body:
^yah it probably is
Zach, just use bPermissions or PEX
replies.body_tagged:
^yah it probably is
Zach, just use bPermissions or PEX

replies.body: I used to use Group Manager, Nametagedit and colorme
replies.body_tagged: I used to use Group Manager, Nametagedit and colorme

replies.body:
Avicus uses it's own custom permissions plugin.

However, there are many public plugins that can do the same thing.

Group Manager, PermissionsEx, and bPermissions are just a few.

Permissions aren't easy if you're new to it, so feel free to YouTube or Google for help if you're stuck :D
replies.body_tagged:
Avicus uses it's own custom permissions plugin.

replies.body: If you need someone to set up permissions and ranks I'm always online on skype. c:
